name: Senryaku Shougi
overview: Senryaku Shōgi is a digital conversion of the traditional Japanese board game Shogi for one or two players. It features two main game modes: a match play mode against another player or the computer at seven different skill levels, and a "conquest" mode where the player must defeat a series of increasingly-difficult computer opponents. There are a variety of options including starting layouts and turn time limits, and the ability to save up to four previous matches in full to review later.
